channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Paytm – Donation Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24554|2024-08-03T19:35:20.133Z -- unknown -- paytm%20%E2%80%93%20donation%20plugin
item.description: The Paytm – Donation Plugin WordPress plugin through 1.3.2 does not sanitise, validate or escape the id GET parameter before using it in a SQL statement when deleting donations, leading to an authenticated SQL injection issue
